reviews.review: хорошая игра с интересным сюжетом прошёл на 100%
Clássico, zerei em 1 dia, conheço o jogo todo pois ja joguei a orange box no xbox
Одна из лучших игр в истории.
Игра немного длинная и быстро надоедает. Но в целом за 16 гривен топ.
玩其他FPS头不晕，唯独半条命还是当年熟悉的味道，玩一会就开始头晕，谜（游戏还是很好玩的）
Я прошел халву 6 раз, получил почти все достижения, решил пройти на харде, на котором армия хедкрабов - жопа
游戏名称：把罐子捡起来

劇情做得非常好!!
不過遲遲沒有三代的消息，希望有生之年可以玩到呢。
И так все знают эту игру, интересный гемплей, надо включать мозги ну вообще игра норм

I recently re-bought half life 2 after not having played it for about 10 years. I initially bought it on the orange box for xbox, and its still one of my favorite games. It's got great level design and likable characters. I would definitely recommend this series, and with the great price I was able to get it, it would make a nice gift to someone who's never played it!
一款跨时代游戏作品，让人很难看出这是2004年的游戏，优化没得说，剧情引人入胜
Игра хорошая. Надеюсь 3 часть тоже поиграть :)
ตำนานไม่ถึง3
Don't call yourself a gamer if you haven't played this game.
Uno de los mejores juegos que existieron jamás. Una historia increíble, atrapante, misteriosa y bien desarrollada y unos gráficos que para el 2004 eran superiores al resto.

I like it, imo better than original Half Life, despite its age Half Life 2, is still kinda fun.  The Source Engine really brings out its potential. I would Highly Recommend this game to a friend, but it may not have more weapons than Half Life 1, but its more fun to play with mods and with the base game alone.. I recommend trying out other Valve games if you love this one. The only problem is the deathmatch.
Overall Score: 9.3/10
It's a classic for a reason. Good story, good mechanics and fun.
If you don't recommend you have the big gay...

The original
The epic
The game that changed all of us
Half life 2
Enough Said

Grab your trusty crowbar, your infinite pistol and your brightly revealing EXO-Suit as you smash your way through hordes of hostaged zombies and alien freaks who would do anything to make you in scrumptious dinner.
Gra jest wciągająca i ma idealny klimat :D

At first I was sad since I beat Black Mesa but then realized they have Half-Life 2. I have three hours in and all I can say is I am not disappointed. Great game, I might have enjoyed it when I was younger but better now that i am 36 and have a gaming PC. Life is pretty good right now.
Sıkıcı oyun oyun hikayesi çok iyi ama bir zaman sonra sıkıyor Alex oyundaki herşeyi bozuyor nedeni herşeyi anlatıyor ve beni bu çok sinir ediyor  ama yinede iyi oyun tavsiye ediyorum

Much like Mario Odyssey, the constant pushing of and exciting mechanics keeps you gripped to what could only be described as: A sharp, simple, innovative shooter, that has aged like fine wine.
YOU MUST PLAY THIS GAME

Nic dodać, nic ująć ta gra to klasyk.
Gra się bardzo dobrze zestarzała i pomimo tylu lat na karku gra się w nią przyjemnie.
Po powrocie do half-life 1 postanowiłem ograć całą serie i bardzo cieszę się z tej decyzji.
W half-life 2 gra się bardzo przyjemnie:
Dobra fizyka
System strzelania itd.
Bardzo zachęcam osoby które nie miały styczności z tym tytółem do zapoznania się z nim chociarz powinny zrobić to bardzo dawno temu.
OYUN ÇOK GÜZEL ama korktuğunuzda oluyo yani cesursanız bence oynayın inşallah 3.sü de çıkar

Half-Life 2... Hay algo que decir? Ya todos conocemos su historia, Freeman vuelve cargado de acción, suspenso, aventura.
Un juegazo, 10/10

[h1] Half-Life 2 O Jogo Muito antes do seu tempo! (ate em 2020) [/h1]

Half life 2 é o jogo mais bem avaliado da de PCS, e considerado o melhor jogo de toda a Valve.

Bem, eu sinceramente achei Half life 2 um jogo Mais que INCRÍVEL! Mas ainda não e o Melhor jogo da valve, Este e simplesmente o Jogo com a Melhor qualidade Grafica e com os Melhores Controles dos jogos de PCS.

Uma historia certamente Perfeita pra uma continuação do Classico Half-Life

Não, A Valve não ira fazer o Half life 3 :(

Half life 2 E um Item OBRIGATÓRIO Pra cada jogador E Certamente um marco SURREALMENTE e Surpreendente na Historia dos Vídeo-Games!
игра крутая классный сюжет вообщем шедевр
Топ игра, играл в нее когда еще на дисках была) Жду 3 часть
Definitely one of the kind of games that you must play, reccomended to anyone who hasnt played it, along with the 1rst
I played this back in 2004 and didn't like it. I tried it again in 2018 and loved it.  Classic FPS. Though I enjoy open world games, it was nice to play this simple linear game for a change
Oyun süper aksiyonlu ve öyle çok yer kaplamıyor verdiğiniz paranın karşılığını veriyor
half life yı oynadıysanız bunu da beğenirsiniz

Amazing game, especially for something made in 2004! Highly recommend, if you enjoy story games and FPS games, this game combines the best of both worlds!!

1에 비해 월등히 나아진 플레이 환경
그러나 길 찾기는 여전히 어렵다.
갑자기 튀어나오는 적들도 여전하다.
15년 된 게임이라 불합리함은 어쩔 수 없나 보다.

Game itself is great though, I'm having terrible experience with this.
When I reached about game progress 40% (My achivements says 39%),
The game became unstable, and crashed.
This occurred persistently even after reloading the game or even reinstalling on other PC.
After several attempts, I gave up and tried to restart from the earlier save point which would work fine,
but I happened to know that about 10days of autosave/quicksave was gone.
I didn't remove any, and don't know how it is managed.
Now I have to repeat my 10 days of single-path game play.
Who know this issue might occur again?
Support team says they cannot help on this case, nor refund it because I played more than 2 hours.
What a great user experience.
